data.lyric:
[ti:Eastside]
[ar:J.Fla (제이플라)]
[al:Natural]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Eastside - J.Fla (제이플라)
[00:12.81]When I was young I fell in love
[00:15.12]We used to hold hands man that was enough
[00:18.08]Then we grew up started to touch
[00:20.38]Used to kiss underneath the light on the back of the bus
[00:23.44]Oh no your daddy didn't like me much
[00:25.78]And he didn't believe me when I said you were the one
[00:28.82]Every day she found a way out of the window to sneak out late
[00:32.63]She used to meet me on the Eastside
[00:34.95]In the city where the sun don't set
[00:38.03]And every day you know that we ride
[00:39.99]Through the backstreets of a blue Corvette
[00:43.06]Baby you know I just wanna leave tonight
[00:46.55]We can go anywhere we want
[00:48.85]Drive down to the coast jump in the sea
[00:51.80]Just take my hand and come with me
[00:55.45]We can do anything if we put our minds to it
[00:58.31]Take your whole life then you put a line through it
[01:00.93]My love is yours if you're willing to take it
[01:03.57]Give me your heart 'cause I ain't gonna break it
[01:06.12]So come away starting today
[01:08.34]Start a new life together in a different place
[01:11.02]We know that love is how all these ideas came to be
[01:13.50]So baby run away with me
[01:16.80]Seventeen and we got a dream to have a family
[01:19.95]A house and everything in between
[01:21.58]And then oh suddenly we turned twenty-three
[01:24.33]Now we got pressure for taking our life more seriously
[01:26.82]We got our dead-end jobs and got bills to pay
[01:29.83]Half our friends are now are enemies
[01:32.05]Now I'm thinking back to when I was young
[01:34.85]Back to the day when I was falling in love
[01:36.83]He used to meet me on the Eastside
[01:39.23]In the city where the sun don't set
[01:42.09]And every day you know where we ride
[01:44.12]Through the backstreets in a blue Corvette
[01:47.15]Baby you know I just wanna leave tonight
[01:50.54]We can go anywhere we want
[01:52.74]Drive down to the coast jump in the sea
[01:55.75]Just take my hand and come with me
[01:59.48]We can do anything if we put our minds to it
[02:02.10]Take your whole life then you put a line through it
[02:04.74]My love is yours if you're willing to take it
[02:07.47]Give me your heart 'cause I ain't gonna break it
[02:10.04]So come away starting today
[02:12.24]Start a new life together in a different place
[02:14.89]We know that love is how all these ideas came to be
[02:17.38]So baby run away with me
data.trans:
[ti:Eastside]
[ar:J.Fla (제이플라)]
[al:Natural]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.81]当我年轻时谈恋爱
[00:15.12]牵牵手感觉已经足够
[00:18.08]后来我们慢慢长大 开始学会爱抚
[00:20.38]总是在公交车后座的黑暗里偷偷接吻
[00:23.44]你的爸爸并不是很中意我
[00:25.78]当我说你就是我命中注定的人时 他并不相信我
[00:28.82]每天晚上她都想办法从窗户溜出来
[00:32.63]我们总是在东区见面
[00:34.95]在那座城市 太阳不会下山
[00:38.03]你知道 每天我们都驾驶一辆
[00:39.99]蓝色Corvette穿过街道
[00:43.06]宝贝 你知道我 今天就想离开
[00:46.55]我们可以去任何想去的地方
[00:48.85]驶向海岸 跳入海里
[00:51.80]只需牵着我的手 跟我出发
[00:55.45]只要我们用心 什么事情都能做到
[00:58.31]你控制着自己的人生 并在外围画上了线
[01:00.93]如果你想拿走 我的爱全部属于你
[01:03.57]把你的心给我 因为我永远不会使它破碎
[01:06.12]所以 今天就出发吧
[01:08.34]我们一起去一个新的地方 开始新生活
[01:11.02]我们明白 爱情就是这样产生
[01:13.50]所以 宝贝 与我一起逃离吧
[01:16.80]十七岁的我们梦想着组建一个家庭
[01:19.95]有一座房子 还有里面的一切
[01:21.58]忽然间我们就二十三岁了
[01:24.33]现在我们更加严肃地对待我们的生活 压力也更大
[01:26.82]我们做着没什么前途的工作 要还很多账单
[01:29.83]半数朋友已经成为了敌人
[01:32.05]现在我回想着年轻时候
[01:34.85]回到我们刚刚相爱的日子
[01:36.83]我们总是在东区见面
[01:39.23]在那座城市 太阳不会下山
[01:42.09]你知道 每天我们都驾驶一辆
[01:44.12]蓝色Corvette穿过街道
[01:47.15]宝贝 你知道我 今天就想离开
[01:50.54]我们可以去任何想去的地方
[01:52.74]驶向海岸 跳入海里
[01:55.75]只需牵着我的手 跟我出发
[01:59.48]只要我们用心 什么事情都能做到
[02:02.10]你控制着自己的人生 并在外围画上了线
[02:04.74]如果你想拿走 我的爱全部属于你
[02:07.47]把你的心给我 因为我永远不会使它破碎
[02:10.04]所以 今天就出发吧
[02:12.24]我们一起去一个新的地方 开始新生活
[02:14.89]我们明白 爱情就是这样产生
[02:17.38]所以 宝贝 与我一起逃离吧
